tags.name: Non-privileged
tags.description: Operations available for both end-user systems and service providers

/dialogporten.summary: Path used to manage the list of dialogue elements.
/dialogporten.description: The REST endpoint/path used to list and for service provides to create dialogue elements.  This path contains a `GET` and `POST` operation to perform the list and create tasks, respectively.

get.description: API for listing/searching for dialogue elements.

200.description: Successful response - returns an array of dialogue elements.

requestBody.description: A new dialogue element to be created using the `DialogueElementRequest` model

/dialogporten/{id}.summary: Path used to manage a single dialogue element.
/dialogporten/{id}.description: The REST endpoint/path used to get, update, and delete single dialogue elements.  This path contains `GET`, `PUT`, `PATCH` and `DELETE` operations used to perform the get, update, and delete tasks, respectively.

get.description: Gets the details of a single dialogue element.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A unique identifier for a dialogue element.
